checkpoints.title: A missed dream
checkpoints.description: Growing up, I've always aspired to be a doctor. However, after 10th grade and some experience working with real doctors, I realized I couldn't stand blood and extreme images.

checkpoints.title: My new path
checkpoints.description: On the search for a new purpose in life, I stumbled across the world of programming, a place where I can have a positive impact on people's lives and guide them on getting the help they need from professionals.

checkpoints.title: The first program
checkpoints.description: I took Mr. Mosh’s Python course from his youtube channel: Programming with Mosh to write my first program.

checkpoints.title: Oh, it’s serious now
checkpoints.description: After some time messing around with Python, I decided to complete Harvard’s CS50 course for a better grasp of computer fundamentals.

checkpoints.title: Data Structure & Algorithm
checkpoints.description: During the CS50 course, I was introduced to  new data structures that I’ve never heard of. Apparently the root of the tree is on top now.
